title: Cristian Riggio
text:
Cristian Riggio (born 4 June 1996) is an Italian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="Fidelis%20Andria%202018">Fidelis Andria</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Serie%20C">Serie C</a> debut for <a href="S.S.%20Akragas%20Citt%C3%A0%20dei%20Templi">Akragas</a> on 28 August 2016 in a game against <a href="U.S.%20Vibonese%20Calcio">Vibonese</a>.
After playing for <a href="U.S.%20Catanzaro%201929">Catanzaro</a> on loan in the 2017–18 season, he joined the club on a permanent basis on 20 July 2018, signing a 2-year contract.
On 6 January 2021, he joined <a href="S.S.%20Monopoli%201966">Monopoli</a> on loan with an obligation to buy at the end of the 2020–21 season.
On 8 January 2022, he moved to <a href="Fidelis%20Andria%202018">Fidelis Andria</a>.
